mapper.insert: insert into myCal(calNum, op1, op, op2, result) values (myCal_seq.nextval, #{op1}, #{op}, #{op2}, #{result})
mapper.select: select calNum, op1, op, op2, result from myCal where calNum = #{calNum}
mapper.update: update myCal set op1 = #{op1}, op = #{op}, op2 = #{op2}, result = #{result} where calNum = #{calNum}
